name: Xio: Survival
description:
XIO Survival© is a level-based-instance experience.
Start by launching inside your own player-housing-level; where you have the ability to:
STORE LOOT,
DECORATE,
or even INVITE FRIENDS to enjoy your personal space.

Begin your journey by launching a random-level event to explore and search for loot, assign yourself quests that need to be completed, or meet up with players on the community (hub) rooftop to trade and socialize.

In XIO Survival, you are now able to crash another player(s) hosted game and engage in multiplayer for thievery, stealing, and defeating other players to take their inventory items.

Experience each level, stay vigilant and be sure to save all your in-game currency to purchase better items, or collect resources to craft necessary weapons and armor to survive.
